ygData.subject: Help with some ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: BTW this is jadedd_lover, my roommate uses that name lol not sure why my yahoo picked that one. Anywhoo. I have 2 questions I hope you will all be able to help
ygData.messageBody:
BTW this is jadedd_lover, my roommate uses that name lol not sure
why my yahoo picked that one. Anywhoo. I have 2 questions I hope you
will all be able to help me with. Firstly, I have to plan a wedding
for my 2 best friends. Of course there will be drinks and food. And
they have a ritual planned for the actual joining. I am thinking or
fireworks and such as well. Has anyone planned a wedding, would a
guide officiate..any other ideas for how we could make it special.
It's actually a double wedding. One is a 52 vah shir bard marying a
50 high elf enchantress and the other couple are a pr of 52 pallies
that share same deity, race, class ect!. and secondly, as a way to
have more fun and move away from xp grinding as well as to promote
new friendships within the guild i would like to host an rp event
but i dont really know where or how to start..if anyone has done one
before and could lend me some help or guidelines that would be
great. Thanks all =)
